dataset_urls = {
    'sin_K2_C5': 'https://www.dropbox.com/s/hn37oyidt9joj2p/sin_K2_C5.zip',

[docs]def list_collate_fn(batch):
    x = [item[0] for item in batch]
    y = [item[1] for item in batch]
    return x, y
